mapper.sql: id, nickname, email, realname, tel, phone, gender, birth, password, checkcode, logintime, score, invalid, picture, createtime, updatetime, nickname_j, realname_j, gender_j, j_c
mapper.select:
select
from t_user
( nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR nickname_j LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
AND createtime >= #{sc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND #{ec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= createtime
AND createtime >= #{sc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{ec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= createtime
AND updatetime >= #{su,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND #{eu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= updatetime
AND updatetime >= #{su,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{eu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= updatetime

SELECT
FROM t_user WHERE `password`= #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( nickname = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR email = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR tel = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
